Who Am I?

I am a passionate developer based in Shanghai, focusing on building accessible, pixel-perfect user interfaces.

Currently blending the power of Vue.js Ecosystem with creative animations to bring static designs to life. This website is my digital garden where I experiment with new tech.

I believe that clean code and thoughtful design are two sides of the same coin.
